name: Super Formation Soccer 94: World Cup Edition
overview: The third game in their Super Formation Soccer series. It is based on the 1994 World Cup event, held in the USA, and features the twenty four national teams that qualified that year. Japan, which did not qualify, replaces South Korea (which did) in the roster to appease the Japan-exclusive audience for the game. The game features alternate modes as well as a World Cup Mode, and in these modes the player can select other non-qualifying teams like England, Uruguay, France and Denmark. Super Formation Soccer 94 was re-released as the updated Super Formation Soccer 94 World Cup Final Data in September the same year.
